summary: My location marker position good only while zooming.

comments.content: What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Enable myLocation 2. Zoom in/out 3. Move map What is the expected output? What do you see instead? While zooming in/out position is correct. Sometimes it stays so until map is moved. Then it changes back to wrong position. It should point to same position What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? 3.0.9 on Android 4.1.2 Please provide any additional information below.
First and third images were taken while map was zooming. Second one is after it.
Do you have hardware acceleration turned off?
Yes. It's strange. It seems that version 3.0.8 doesn't have that bug. But it has bug with other custom map icons...
Please take a look at the sample application which doesn't have this issue. Determine what is different between your application and the sample application and report back here.
Just to let you know, this issue is resolved with new version (3.0.10)
Excellent! I still suspect you may have hardware acceleration on - if you can't display the compass overlay for example, then you have it on - but either way, it's fixed. Thanks for reporting back.
